sentences.en: "Are you sure the raft is safe?" she asked anxiously. "Couldn't be safer," Max assured her confidently.
sentences.cn: “你确定木筏安全吗？”她不安地问道。“再安全不过了，”马克斯信心十足地向她保证道。

sentences.en: A broad shouldered man wearing a dinner jacket swaggered confidently up to the bar.
sentences.cn: 穿晚礼服的宽肩膀男子神气十足地走向吧台。

sentences.en: A man wearing a dinner jacket swaggered confidently up to the bar.
sentences.cn: 穿晚礼服的男子神气十足地走向吧台。

sentences.en: Any time we make a corner case into an error we need to carefully specify exactly what the error case is so that we can implement it correctly and test it confidently.
sentences.cn: 每当我们让一种特殊情况变成一个错误时，我们需要细心辨别出错误情况究竟是什么，这样我们才能正确地执行它，并且自信地测试它。

sentences.en: From here on he brings the character confidently alive.
sentences.cn: 从这里开始他真正将这个角色演活了。

sentences.en: He confidently proclaims that he is offering the best value in the market.
sentences.cn: 他信心百倍地声称他的产品是市场上最物有所值的。

sentences.en: He felt safe now, and he spoke more confidently.
sentences.cn: 他觉得现在安全了, 便更放胆地说起来.

sentences.en: He walked into the shop and calmly ( ie impudently and self - confidently ) stole a pair of gloves.
sentences.cn: 他走进商店若无其事地偷了一副手套.

sentences.en: He's speaking up and asserting himself confidently.
sentences.cn: 他明确表态，信心十足地阐述自己的观点。

sentences.en: I can confidently promise that this year is going to be very different.
sentences.cn: 我可以信心十足地保证今年将大不一样。

sentences.en: I skipped over zero as we counted, but she confidently picked up the number and declared it an oval.
sentences.cn: 当我们数数时，我跳过了零，但我女儿很自信地说出了零，并且说零是一个椭圆。

sentences.en: Phil walked forward confidently but something held Ben back.
sentences.cn: 菲尔信心十足地走向前去,本却踌躇不定.
她充满信心地期待着获胜.

sentences.en: The report asserts confidently that the industry will grow.
sentences.cn: 报告断言这个产业会发展起来.

sentences.en: They would confidently intuit your very thoughts.
sentences.cn: 他们会很有把握地凭直觉猜出你的真实想法。

sentences.en: This seemed to reassure him and he continued more confidently.
sentences.cn: 这似乎使他放心一点,于是他更有信心地继续说了下去.

sentences.en: You can and must act boldly and confidently.
sentences.cn: 你能够而且必须表现得勇敢和自信。
